topic.title: P/Z report for field and regions

body.p: A new property, PRESSURE_GAS_Z_WEIGHTED (alias PRGZ), has been added to the FieldProperties (report label FPRGZ) and RegionProperties (report label RPRGZ) nodes under the XYPlotSummaryReport node. This property is used to report P/Z (gas) average value weighted by gas content of blocks at surface conditions. The Migrator also now supports the migration of FRPGZ and RPRGZ summary vectors from ECLIPSE to INTERSECT.

fig.title: Field, pressure/Z (gas) weighted by gas content
